name: Tashigi
text: On Play: Look at the top 5 cards of your deck, reveal up to 1 {Navy} type card other than [Tashigi] and reveal it, then put it into your hand. Then, place the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

effect.text: Look at the top 5 cards of your deck, reveal up to 1 {Navy} type card other than [Tashigi] and reveal it, then put it into your hand. Then, place the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.
